mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.DuplicateGeoObjectTypeException
mdException.message: A Geo-Object Type with the Code [{duplicateValue}] already exists. Please choose a different value.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.DuplicateHierarchyTypeException
mdException.message: A Hierarchy Type with the Code [{duplicateValue}] already exists. Please choose a different value.
